author: archyde
title: Boost Your Riceâ€™s Cancer Prevention Effect: Adding These Foods When Cooking
text:
2023-12-28 22:30:00
food
If you add â€˜thisâ€™ when cooking riceâ€¦ Increased cancer prevention effect
Reporter Lee Hae-na | Intern reporter Lee Ara
Entered 2023/12/29 07:30
If you use green tea water instead of bottled water when cooking rice, you can increase the polyphenol content, an antioxidant./Photo = Clip Art Korea
Although rice is eaten every day, its health effects can vary depending on how it is prepared. Letâ€™s look at four foods that help prevent cancer when added when cooking rice.
â—‡Green tea
If you use green tea water instead of bottled water when cooking rice, it becomes rich in antioxidants. According to a paper published in the Korean Journal of Food and Nutrition, when 200g of white rice was cooked with green tea water (3g of green tea powder dissolved in the water used for rice cooking), the polyphenol content, an antioxidant, was 40 times higher. lost. Polyphenols have excellent anti-cancer effects by reducing free radicals in the body and preventing damage to DNA and proteins caused by free radicals.
â—‡Soju
Adding soju to brown rice can also increase the polyphenol content. A research team from the National Institute of Crop Science under the Rural Development Administration added 30% brown rice to 100g of white rice and then cooked rice by adding 120mL of bottled water or 100mL of bottled water and 2 glasses of soju. As a result, rice cooked with two glasses of soju had a 17% higher polyphenol content than rice cooked with just water. This is because alcohol helps to release more of the polyphenol content in brown rice. All alcohol evaporates during the boiling process, so it does not affect the taste of the rice.
â—‡Soybeans
When cooking rice, it is good to add a handful of beans (30g) or the water in which the beans were soaked. The isoflavone content in soybeans prevents the growth of cancer cells and inhibits cancer metastasis. In addition, saponin, a white foam component that forms when soybeans are soaked, is effective in preventing cancer by acting as an antioxidant and preventing cell membrane rupture. A research team at Tufts University in the U.S. followed 6,000 breast cancer patients for 9 years and found that women who consumed a lot of beans had a 21% lower risk of death than women who did not consume soybeans.
â—‡Burdock
Saponin in burdock is also effective in preventing cancer by expelling carcinogens from the body out of the body. There is a study by the National Cancer Center in Japan that found that burdock suppressed the growth of pancreatic cancer by lowering the number of cancer cells. Additionally, the zinc in burdock also helps with antioxidant properties, eliminating free radicals and controlling oxidative stress in the body. Burdock is rich in dietary fiber and has a long digestion period, so it is best to slice it as thinly as possible and add it to rice.
1703804393
#add #cooking #rice #Increased #cancer #prevention #effect

organizations.name: korean journal of food and nutrition

author: Nirave Gondhia
title: Viofo A229 Pro review: The dashcam that made me want a dashcam
text:
Are you a good driver? Ask anyone that question, and the answer is usually yes. I was asked this question earlier this year, and my answer was unequivocally affirmative; Iâ€™m a great driver, and no, I donâ€™t need a dash cam. Having tried the Viofo A229 Pro, I realized that this is incorrect; there are a lot of hazards out there, and having a dash cam can provide a lot of relief.
Ultimately, the Viofo A229 Pro dash cam made me a convert. Itâ€™s the worldâ€™s first dash cam with 4K recording at the front and 2K at the rear, and the wide-angle view means most things are recorded. Itâ€™s excellent, and after fixing a couple of step snafus (which proved crucial), it convinced me that every car needs a dash cam.
Viofo A229 Pro
The Viofo A229 Pro dash cam offers the world's first 4K/2K combination recording. Its high price tag is justified considering its excellent features. And an optional cockpit view camera, polarizing lens, Bluetooth shutter button, and microSD card are ideal accessories that enhance its overall appeal. The camera is adjustable, ensuring you can find the perfect angle for your car's windshield.
- Everything you need from a dash cam
- Features two Sony Starvis 2 sensors
- Excellent overall video quality
- Great voice control and advanced features
- Set up is quite intensive
- Lots of wiring for an integrated experience
- Pricey with all the add-ons
Price, availability, and specs
The Viofo A229 Pro is available for $360, which includes the front camera, rear camera, internal camera, and the Anti-Glass circular polarizing lens. The box also offers spare 3M mount sticky pads to attach the cameras to your windshield or rear window, stickers to remove static, and a car charger.
An alternative bundle is available for $30 more with an additional internal camera. If you want to hardwire the dash cam, you'll need the optional wiring kit that costs an additional $18. The most economical bundle â€” and the one that reflects everything that Viofo sent to us â€” costs $410 and includes all the cameras, the remote shutter, the hardwire kit, and a 512GB microSD card.
What's good about the Viofo A229 Pro?
A very smart dash cam with all the gadgets and gizmos
Youâ€™ll love the Viofo A229 Pro if you love technology and want the complete package. If you buy it with the full bundle, youâ€™ll get two outward-facing cameras and an additional one to record your car's interior, an ND filter for the front camera to prevent lens flare, a Bluetooth shutter remote, and a handy microSD card. Thereâ€™s a lot of wiring included, and while you can choose not to hard-wire it (like I did), the more permanent solution involves passing wiring through the frame of your car.
The main 4K dash cam features an 8MP Sony Starvis 2, 1/1.8-inch IMX678 sensor that can capture 4K videos at 30fps with a 140-degree field of vision. Placed next to your rearview mirror, it is ideal for capturing everything happening ahead of you. The rear camera is a 5MP 1/2.8-inch IMX675 that uses the same sensor technology but drops the video recording resolution to 2K with a 160-degree field of view. The latter's specs also apply to the interior camera; both are great as they capture exactly the amount of detail you need.
I was pleasantly surprised by the cameras' quality. They all feature a higher dynamic range than other dash cams Iâ€™ve tried, although my overall experience with them has been fairly limited. Regardless, the image quality was exceptional, even at night, thanks to DOL-HDR technology, which boosts the quality of captures at night.
The Viofo A229 Pro dash cam uses G-sensor functionality to detect movement in your vehicle and capture anything pertinent. Suppose you have an incident that it detects. In that case, it will record a 45-second video prior and a 30-second video afterward and then store them in a special folder so theyâ€™re not overwritten during the standard loop recording. The GPS logger also captures important information, such as location, speed, and time, and stores it with this, so you always have the necessary information.
You can manually ask the dash cam to record or capture a moment using a Bluetooth shutter or voice control. The latter is particularly useful if you aim for a fully hands-free experience but still want to save a particular scene. I can imagine that this would be super useful if someone is interacting with you, and it would be ideal to record the entire interaction when paired with the internal camera. This would also be useful during more official interactions like traffic stops and provides reassurance that youâ€™ll always have your own copy of the events in question.
The Viofo A229 Pro has two connection options: a simple solution powered by the cigarette lighter or a hardwired solution if you want something more permanent. I avoided the latter because I wasnâ€™t sure Iâ€™d like this dash cam or even want one in my car, but now Iâ€™m a convert. Iâ€™ll be hardwiring this soon.
The additional benefit of doing so is the Intelligent Parking mode, which works like Teslaâ€™s Sentry Mode and helps monitor your car when youâ€™re not in it. This mode kicks in as soon as the ignition is turned off and will automatically capture video if someone damages your car while itâ€™s empty. Itâ€™s the ideal way to ensure you always keep tabs on your vehicle. I live in an area with particularly high auto theft rates, and this feature will provide additional reassurance once it's hardwired.
What's bad about the Viofo A229 Pro?
Itâ€™s simple to install but not that easy
My biggest complaint with the Viofo A229 Pro is that while the installation is simple enough, it has some hiccups. I consider myself handy, but the prospect of hardwiring my car proved fairly daunting. This meant that I hadnâ€™t taken advantage of all the features, although I plan to now that I know I will use it.
As part of the setup process, you must find the right position on your windshield, especially if you donâ€™t want to hardwire the front camera. The power cable is at the top of the dash cam (although the other USB-C ports work just as effectively), so finding a position where it captures everything and the cables donâ€™t affect your sight line can take some trial and error.
Although the manual directly says to adjust the camera, my brain skipped that step, so I drove around for a few days without capturing anything of value. It took less than 15 seconds to address this, but itâ€™s worth keeping this in mind.
And it still remains to be seen how it compares to alternatives like the Rove R2-4K Pro or 70 mai A510.
[Read our review ](/rove-r2-4k-pro-review/)
[ Review: The Rove R2-4K Pro dash cam hits the sweet spot between specs and price ](/rove-r2-4k-pro-review/)
Great specs with reasonable compromises
Should you buy it?
The best dash cam you can buy, but it'll cost you
My biggest concern is not with the Viofo A229 Pro but rather with dash cams as a whole. They provide a lot of reassurance that theyâ€™ll provide evidence when something goes wrong, but equally, they can be used to prove negligence.
That said, just having the Viofo A229 Pro in my car made me conscious of the many road hazards. Knowing that footage of my less-than-perfect driving habits could be used to my detriment also encouraged me to be a safer, more considerate driver. Had you asked me before, I would have said I have no worries about having a dash cam in the car, but now the answer is more muddled because the footage could impact the outcome of incidents, positive or negative. That said, having video footage offers peace of mind; the road can be an unpredictable and hazardous place.
Viofo A229 Pro
The Viofo A229 Pro has all the features I need from a dash cam and, while I still have existential concerns about having a dash cam in my car, there's no denying just how beneficial this one is. I was a skeptic, but as it turns out, I'm now a convert.
Nirave is a creator, evangelist, and founder of House of Tech. A heart attack at 33 inspired him to publish the Impact of Tech newsletter, which covers the impact of technology on mental, physical, and emotional health. For more, follow him on Instagram, Twitter, and LinkedIn.

author: Pedro Miguel Costa
title: No norte de Israel pede-se uma soluÃ§Ã£o permanente e nÃ£o um cessar-fogo com o Hezbollah
text: A 10 km apenas da fronteira com o LÃ­bano, os habitantes da cidade de Nahariya, em Israel, parecem nÃ£o ter dÃºvidas. Dizem que estÃ£o fartos de viver com medo e, por isso, sÃ³ resta o conflito. De lado, fica a opÃ§Ã£o de um cessar-fogo. â€œIsto Ã© uma treta, porque se lhes dermos 21 dias, eles voltam a organizar-se, vÃ£o conseguir novos mÃ­sseis. NÃ£o acredito nelesâ€, diz um local. Uma parte dos que aqui viviam jÃ¡ fugiu para outros lados. Fartaram-se da ameaÃ§a constante que se vive no norte de Israel, paredes meias com os militantes do Hezbollah. â€œHÃ¡ cidades que foram completamente destruÃ­das. As pessoas deixaram as suas comunidades. NÃ£o voltam mais, passado tanto tempo. Lembram-se do passado. As pessoas voltam. JÃ¡ se mudaram com os filhos e inscreveram-nos noutras escolasâ€, explica um habitante local. â€œNÃ£o, nÃ£o acho bem. Penso que temos de acabar com este problema com o Hezbollah e tambÃ©m com Gaza. Temos de acabar com isto. NÃ£o com as pessoas de lÃ¡, mas com o Governo, com os homens queâ€¦ Temos de pÃ´r fim a isto. Temos de os matar, de os travar, seja o que for, mas acabar com a guerra, nÃ£o", diz um local. Alguns parecem estar fartos de tudo: de nÃ£o terem paz, da guerra que Netanyahu insiste em manter, de nÃ£o terem outras opÃ§Ãµes a nÃ£o ser o prÃ³prio conflito. â€œA minha opiniÃ£o Ã© que nÃ£o confio muito no Governo em relaÃ§Ã£o a isto, porque jÃ¡ houve tantos inocentes que perderam a vida, tantas pessoas que perderam o emprego, a casa, a vidaâ€, explica um local. â€œAs pessoas estÃ£o muito, muito tristes com a situaÃ§Ã£o. NÃ£o queremos um cessar-fogo, queremos sim pÃ´r fim a esta situaÃ§Ã£o para sempre. NÃ£o por um ou dois anos. SÃ³ isso", acrescenta outro local. Junto Ã  fronteira com o LÃ­bano, os israelitas querem a paz mas admitem que primeiro tem de haver guerra.

author: info@gulf-times.com (Gulf Times)
title: Sri Lanka clinch T20 series after Zimbabwe collapse
text:
Wanindu Hasarangaâ€™s lower-order demolition eased Sri Lanka to a 2-1 series win against Zimbabwe on Thursday after the tourists were bowled out in Colombo for 82, their worst-ever T20 total.
The home skipperâ€™s 4-15 included two scalps on his final two deliveries and Sri Lanka cruised to a nine-wicket victory inside 11 overs.
â€œToday we bounced back,â€ all-rounder and ex-skipper Angelo Mathews told reporters after the win.
â€œWe have a very attacking captain who wants to achieve bigger things. He has created a good environment. That is the key.â€
Pathum Nissanaka (39 not out) and Kusal Mendis (33) added 64 runs in 46 balls before a deceptive turner from left-arm spinner Sean Williams took the latter off-stump for Zimbabweâ€™s sole breakthrough.
Nissanka sealed Sri Lankaâ€™s win by launching Sikandar Raza for six over long-on when the scores drew level.
Zimbabwe had a creditable start with 56-3 after the first six overs of power play but struggled to score boundaries once fielding restrictions eased.
Number three batsman Brian Bennett top-scored with 29 off just 12 balls, including four boundaries in the second over, before a Hasaranga catch off Mathews sent him back.
But a quick collapse saw the tourists lose their last six wickets for just 11 runs including three in the final three balls of the innings.
Sri Lankaâ€™s fielding stepped up after a shambolic show in the second match handed them a four-wicket defeat and Zimbabwe their first T20 win in the island nation.
â€œWe didnâ€™t turn up today,â€ Zimbabwe captain Raza said after the disappointing finish to the series.
â€œWhen we needed courage and fighting spirit it wasnâ€™t there,â€ he added. â€œThere has been lot of good and bad in this series. We have been either really good or really poor.â€
Hasarangaâ€™s 4-15 was backed up with a return to form by ex-skipper Mathews, who shared the new ball and finished with two wickets.
Mathews had conceded 24 runs in the final over of the second match to gift Zimbabwe their come-from-behind win.
On Thursday marked the first T20 series win for Sri Lanka after a drought stretching back to their Asia Cup win in 2022.
They next host Afghanistan for a one-off Test and six white-ball matches.
BRIEF SCORES
Zimbabwe 82 all out in 14.1 overs (B. Bennett 29; W. Hasaranga 4-15) v Sri Lanka 88-1 in 10.5 overs (P. Nissanka 39 not out, K. Mendis 33; S. Williams 1-13)
Toss: Sri Lanka
Result: Sri Lanka win by nine wickets
Series: Sri Lanka win three-match series 2-1
Sri Lankaâ€™s Wanindu Hasaranga celebrates after taking the wicket of Zimbabweâ€™s Tony Munyonga during the third and final T20I at the R Premadasa Stadium in Colombo on Thursday. (AFP)

author: Zaina Jnina
title: L'Europe et la montÃ©e en puissance de l'extrÃªme droite en 2023
text:
Lâ€™extrÃªme droite gagne du terrain en Europe. Ces partis Ã©mergent dÃ©sormais comme la deuxiÃ¨me force politique dans environ un tiers des pays europÃ©ens, dont plusieurs ont rÃ©ussi Ã  accÃ©der au pouvoir, particuliÃ¨rement en 2023.
La montÃ©e de lâ€™extrÃªme droite en Europe constitue une tendance alarmante, alimentÃ©e par un soutien croissant Ã  ses partis dans divers pays du continent. Ces formations politiques adoptent des idÃ©es populistes extrÃ©mistes, comme en tÃ©moignent les rÃ©sultats Ã©lectoraux en Italie, aux Pays-Bas, en Hongrie et ailleurs.
Aux Pays-Bas, le Parti de la libertÃ© (PVV), figure de proue de lâ€™extrÃªme droite nÃ©erlandaise, de Geert Wilders a connu un succÃ¨s sans prÃ©cÃ©dent. Lors des Ã©lections lÃ©gislatives du mercredi 22 novembre, le parti a remportÃ© 37 siÃ¨ges sur les 150 de la chambre basse du Parlement, rÃ©alisant ainsi un score qui a doublÃ© par rapport Ã  2021. Son arrivÃ©e en tÃªte met fin Ã  13 ans de rÃ©gime de centre-droit sous le leadership du premier ministre Mark Rutte.
Le Parti de la LibertÃ© se caractÃ©rise par ses positions ouvertement anti-immigration, son opposition Ã  lâ€™islamisation et son plaidoyer en faveur dâ€™une sortie de lâ€™Union europÃ©enne.
En Italie, le parti Fratelli dâ€™Italia, dirigÃ© par Giorgia Meloni, dÃ©tient le pouvoir depuis septembre 2022, accentuant la prÃ©occupation face Ã  cette montÃ©e en puissance. Avec plus de 26% des voix, Meloni, a ramenÃ© au pouvoir une coalition des droites qui rassemblait plus de 44% des suffrages. Selon les observateurs, il sâ€™agit du gouvernement le plus Ã  droite depuis Mussolini.
En octobre 2023, lâ€™opposition centriste pro-europÃ©enne a remportÃ© la majoritÃ© parlementaire en Pologne. Les trois formations dâ€™opposition, la Coalition civique (KO), les chrÃ©tiens-dÃ©mocrates de la TroisiÃ¨me voie et la Gauche, ont remportÃ© ensemble 248 siÃ¨ges dans le parlement de 460 dÃ©putÃ©s, contre 212 siÃ¨ges pour le parti Droit et Justice (PiS) et la ConfÃ©dÃ©ration (extrÃªme droite) rÃ©unis. Cela a dÃ©sormais marquÃ© la fin de huit ans du PiS de Jaroslaw Kaczynski.
Dans des pays comme la Finlande, la Lettonie et la Slovaquie, des partis dâ€™extrÃªme droite participent activement Ã  des coalitions gouvernementales, consolidant ainsi leur influence politique. En octobre dernier, la Slovaquie sâ€™est ajoutÃ©e Ã  la liste des pays europÃ©ens oÃ¹ un parti dâ€™extrÃªme droite fait partie du gouvernement, en lâ€™occurrence le Parti national slovaque (SNS), membre de la coalition dirigÃ©e par Robert Fico.
Bien que lâ€™extrÃªme droite ne soit pas au pouvoir en Finlande, elle occupe une place significative dans le gouvernement. Le Premier ministre actuel gouverne en coalition avec le Parti des Finlandais, qui a obtenu la deuxiÃ¨me place avec 20,1 % des voix, ainsi que le Parti populaire suÃ©dois de Finlande (4,3 %) et les ChrÃ©tiens-dÃ©mocrates (4,2 %). Cette dynamique est Ã©galement observable dans des gouvernements ultraconservateurs comme celui de la Hongrie.
En Espagne, le Premier ministre, Pedro SÃ¡nchez a rÃ©ussi Ã  former un gouvernement de coalition de la gauche minoritaire Ã  la suite des Ã©lections gÃ©nÃ©rales anticipÃ©es de juillet dernier. Toutefois, cette rÃ©ussite ne masque pas lâ€™Ã©ventuelle montÃ©e en puissance de lâ€™extrÃªme droite en Espagne, avec des partis tels que Vox, qui dÃ©veloppe de nouvelles stratÃ©gies pour atteindre leurs objectifs.
La propagation de ces idÃ©es et la participation active de ces partis aux gouvernements soulÃ¨vent ainsi des inquiÃ©tudes quant Ã  lâ€™avenir politique de lâ€™Europe.

author: Diego Ariza
title: PolÃ©mico exjugador de Millonarios volverÃ­a al equipo de Gamero: â€œClaro que sÃ­â€ - Infobae
text:
Millonarios considerarÃ­a a un jugador que pasÃ³ por el equipo y terminÃ³ en malos tÃ©rminos con los aficionados - crÃ©dito Colprensa Millonarios viene de una dura derrota ante AtlÃ©tico Nacional por 2-1 por la Liga BetPlay, siendo el primer golpe fuerte en el equipo de Alberto Gamero para el segundo semestre, cuando se reforzÃ³ con nueve jugadores para pelear por el tÃ­tulo y suma cuatro puntos en tres duelos.
En medio del dolor por la caÃ­da en El CampÃ­n, se presentÃ³ una polÃ©mica porque un exjugador quiere volver a la instituciÃ³n, estÃ¡ abierto a negociar y el tÃ©cnico Alberto Gamero lo conoce porque lo dirigiÃ³ en 2020 , pero que los hinchas no lo tienen en sus mejores afectos.
Ahora puede seguirnos en nuestro WhatsApp Channel y en Facebook .
El futbolista, que ya ha sido campeÃ³n del fÃºtbol colombiano, tiene buen mercado en el paÃ­s y caerÃ­a bien en algÃºn cuadro histÃ³rico, aunque aceptÃ³ que por el momento estÃ¡ descansando, preparÃ¡ndose fÃ­sicamente y luego considerarÃ¡ opciones en el periodo de transferencias que cierra el 2 de agosto.
â€œSi es lo que Dios pone, claro que siâ€ Desde que Alberto Gamero tomÃ³ las riendas de Millonarios, en diciembre de 2019, cuando acabÃ³ la temporada de ese aÃ±o, pasaron cientos de futbolistas en su equipo y muchos de ellos se potenciaron con el paso de los aÃ±os, sobre todo provenientes de las divisiones inferiores.
Un jugador que tuvo una buena Ã©poca en el cuadro azul es Jhon Duque, volante que asegurÃ³ que estarÃ­a dispuesto a regresar al cuadro Embajador , pese a su pasado en AtlÃ©tico Nacional que provocÃ³ el rechazo de los hinchas en redes sociales y en los enfrentamientos.
Jhon Duque fue figura de Millonarios entre 2017 y 2020, con tÃ©cnicos como Miguel Ãngel Russo, Jorge Luis Pinto y Alberto Gamero - crÃ©dito Jaime Saldarriaga/REUTERS â€œ Si es lo que Dios pone, claro que sÃ­. Creo que eso hace parte del profesionalismo de uno , cuando lleguÃ© a Nacional lo veÃ­a como una situaciÃ³n difÃ­cil, pero me siento orgulloso, los retos nunca nos deben dar miedoâ€, dijo el mediocampista al programa El Vbar Caracol .
Jhon Duque vistiÃ³ la camiseta azul entre 2017 y 2020, disputÃ³ 137 partidos, marcÃ³ dos goles y cuatro asistencias, saliÃ³ campeÃ³n del torneo FinalizaciÃ³n 2017 y la Superliga 2018, y en su momento era parte de los referentes de la instituciÃ³n por su entrega en la cancha.
Jhon Duque afirmÃ³ en 2023 que jugar ante Millonarios, luego de firmar con AtlÃ©tico Nacional, fue un momento mentalmente duro para Ã©l - crÃ©dito Colprensa Desde enero de 2022 hasta el pasado 23 de julio de 2024, el Ingeniero fue fichado por AtlÃ©tico Nacional, que lo comprÃ³ al San Luis de MÃ©xico, apareciÃ³ en 79 compromisos, anotÃ³ dos tantos y fue campeÃ³n del Apertura 2022, Superliga y Copa Colombia 2023.
â€œJugar en BogotÃ¡ serÃ­a muy buena opciÃ³nâ€ Aunque Jhon Duque estÃ¡ abierto a un regreso a Millonarios, conjunto en el que se dio a conocer como figura tras debutar con Fortaleza, el futbolista mirarÃ¡ otras ofertas en el mercado de fichajes, una de esas serÃ­a en Santa Fe, con el que lo vincularon en los Ãºltimos dÃ­as.
Jhon Duque tiene experiencia internacional con el AtlÃ©tico de San Luis, en MÃ©xico, donde jugÃ³ una temporada en 2021 - crÃ©dito AtlÃ©tico de San Luis â€œ TodavÃ­a no he contemplado nada todavÃ­a, fue algo que me cogiÃ³ fuera de base porque uno ya empieza a hacer ciertos planes , estaba muy acomodado, ahora debemos esperar y mirar que se viene en el camino. Yo habÃ­a hablado con el tÃ©cnico hace un tiempo, me dijo que no me iba a tener muy en cuenta y le dije que me podÃ­a decir antes cuando se supo de los otros compaÃ±eros. La idea era quedarme, pero llegamos a un acuerdo y finalizamos el contratoâ€, explicÃ³ el volante.
Para el Ingeniero, la idea es regresar a la capital colombiana para seguir su carrera en el fÃºtbol colombiano, tanto por tema deportivo como personal: â€œJugar en BogotÃ¡ serÃ­a muy buena opciÃ³n porque tendrÃ­a cerca a mi familia, MedellÃ­n me encanta, estaba muy acomodado, tenÃ­a mi hogar y mi hijo era muy feliz allÃ¡, ahora estamos abiertos de mirar posibilidadesâ€.

author: Uneeb Khan
title: Where to Buy Trimix Injection Online

Trimix is a compounded medication comprising three key ingredients â€“ alprostadil, papaverine, and phentolamine. Together, these components work synergistically to enhance blood flow to the penis, aiding in achieving and maintaining an erection. B. Components and their roles Each component plays a crucial role â€“ alprostadil dilates blood vessels, papaverine relaxes smooth muscle tissue, and phentolamine helps prevent the constriction of blood vessels. title: Intensas lluvias provocan inundaciones en el norte de Inglaterra
text:
Intensas lluvias provocan inundaciones en el norte de Inglaterra
Este sÃ¡bado, varias carreteras en el norte de Inglaterra quedaron inundadas y numerosas personas quedaron sin suministro elÃ©ctrico, causado por las lluvias torrenciales. El canal Bridgewater de la localidad de Little Bollington, en el noroeste del paÃ­s, se desbordÃ³ por primera vez en 50 aÃ±os.
â—ï¸Hereâ€™s a closer drone view of the collapsed Bridgewater Canal embankment in Dunham Massey, taken today.
Engineers have been at the scene assessing the scale of the damage, which represents the most significant breach of the canal since 1971.
ðŸŽ¥ Semuel Edward Mills
[pic.twitter.com/iZlFR53SAK]â€” Altrincham Today (@altrinchamtoday)
[January 2, 2025]
Autoridades policÃ­acas de Gran Manchester, al norte de la regiÃ³n inglesa, reportaron incidentes por lluvias en diferentes zonas, entre ellas, las localidades de Bolton, Stockport y Wigan, despuÃ©s de las precipitaciones de los Ãºltimos dÃ­as.
TambiÃ©n se reportÃ³ que diferentes zonas de Cheshire y Lancashire, al norte de Inglaterra, se vieron daÃ±adas, mientras que las carreteras de muchas zonas se han vuelto intransitables.
Las lluvias y los fuertes vientos forzaron la cancelaciÃ³n de varios eventos al aire libre programados para la Nochevieja.
La Oficina de MeteorologÃ­a alertÃ³ ademÃ¡s que se esperan temperaturas muy por debajo de los cero grados centÃ­grados.
(Con informaciÃ³n de [TeleSur](https://www.telesurtv.net/intensas-lluvias-provocan-inundaciones-en-inglaterra/))
